detectors.description:
Investment () contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- investors.push(msg.sender) ()
detectors.markdown:
[Investment]() contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- [investors.push(msg.sender)]()

detectors.description:
Investment.calcReturnValue(uint256,uint256) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- value / 10 * rates[i] ()
detectors.markdown:
[Investment.calcReturnValue(uint256,uint256)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [value / 10 * rates[i]]()

detectors.description:
Investment.calcReturnValue(uint256,uint256) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- (value - remainingVal) / 10 * rates[i] + calcReturnValue(remainingVal,limits[i + 1]) ()
detectors.markdown:
[Investment.calcReturnValue(uint256,uint256)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [(value - remainingVal) / 10 * rates[i] + calcReturnValue(remainingVal,limits[i + 1])]()

detectors.description:
Investment.calcReturnValue(uint256,uint256) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- value / 10 * rates[limits.length - 1] ()
detectors.markdown:
[Investment.calcReturnValue(uint256,uint256)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [value / 10 * rates[limits.length - 1]]()

detectors.description:
Investment.calcReturnValue(uint256,uint256) () contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- i >= 0 ()
Investment.withdraw() () ignores return value by msg.sender.send(this.balance) ()

Deprecated standard detected THROW ():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [THROW]():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

detectors.description: solc-0.4.7 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.7 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Investment.returnInvestmentRecursive(uint256) ():
	External calls:
	- ! investors[investorIndex].send(val) ()
	- returnInvestmentRecursive(value - val) ()
		- ! investors[investorIndex].send(value) ()
		- ! investors[investorIndex].send(val) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- returnInvestmentRecursive(value - val) ()
		- balances[investors[investorIndex]] -= value ()
		- balances[investors[investorIndex]] = 0 ()
	- returnInvestmentRecursive(value - val) ()
		- investorIndex ++ ()
		- investorIndex ++ ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Investment.returnInvestmentRecursive(uint256)]():
	External calls:
	- [! investors[investorIndex].send(val)]()
	- [returnInvestmentRecursive(value - val)]()
		- [! investors[investorIndex].send(value)]()
		- [! investors[investorIndex].send(val)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [returnInvestmentRecursive(value - val)]()
		- [balances[investors[investorIndex]] -= value]()
		- [balances[investors[investorIndex]] = 0]()
	- [returnInvestmentRecursive(value - val)]()
		- [investorIndex ++]()
		- [investorIndex ++]()

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Investment.returnInvestment() ():
	External calls:
	- returnInvestmentRecursive(msg.value) ()
		- ! investors[investorIndex].send(value) ()
		- ! investors[investorIndex].send(val) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Returned(msg.value) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Investment.returnInvestment()]():
	External calls:
	- [returnInvestmentRecursive(msg.value)]()
		- [! investors[investorIndex].send(value)]()
		- [! investors[investorIndex].send(val)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Returned(msg.value)]()
